title: Dead Screen/ Backup data
content:
Hello all!

I know this question has been asked for the pixel 2 but I'll give it a try for the pixel 4a. 

I have only used this device for a month and unfortunately the screen had a little crack, turned black and stopped working (odd!). Now I am hesitant to replace the screen because I know that google repair factory resets your device and I am in need of the data on my pixel (I hope there's another way about it).  

So the question is, how can I command the device or at least transfer photos from the device with a black pixel 4a screen.

Thank you all in advance!
